_header: Say to the fair that is so here
_description: Rewards to various types of persons, in a Latin prose sermon — four couplets

CamJes13.First Lines:
Say to þe feyr þat is so herfrom is stude he sal a
                    waer…
CamJes13.Last Lines:
…Say to þe h[ ]þe þat he sal liueRest and
                    richesce ic sal him ȝeue
